answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Chris – below are links to various agencies golf course marketing plans:
Rockville, MD (page 3)
http://www.rockvillemd.gov/redgate/Redgate_Report-NGF.pdf
Los Angeles, CA
http://www.laparks.org/commissionerhtm/pdf2011/jun06/11-173.pdf
Golf Operator Magazine
http://www.cunninglyclevergolfoperator.com/wordpress/index.php/2011/01/2011-golf-club-business-plan/
City of Tumwater
http://www.ci.tumwater.wa.us/City%20Departments/Parks/GOLF%20Full%20RFP%2012-3.pdf
Salt Lake City – rather dated
http://www.slcgov.com/council/agendas/2002agendas/reports/10082002A-4.pdf
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org

author: Chris McCartt
text: Has anyone developed a marketing plan for a municipal golf course and if so would you be willing to share some or all of the successes that came from the plan?  Thank you!
title: Golf Course Marketing Plan
